publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-676.1 Ms Wendy Alexander: Public Investment in the Infrastructure of Scotland—As an amendment to motion (S1M-676) in the name of Fiona Hyslop, leave out from "notes" to end and insert "and welcomes the action taken by the Scottish Executive to provide the policy framework and secure the resources necessary to achieve the targets set out in the Programme for Government and make a real difference in our communities."
